<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules">
    <x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">

        <action_delete>false</action_delete>

        <execute_function>false</execute_function>
        <filter_condition/>
        <is_rest>false</is_rest>
        <message/>
        <name>Place Order for Accurate BG External Int</name>
        <order>100</order>
        <priority>100</priority>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
 // Add your code here
 
 var ACCURATE_BG_CHECK_PLACE_ORDER_OUTBOUND_SERVICE ="aff15b4ec36203007923d73bf3d3ae6e";
 var ACCURATE_BG_CHECK_HR_INTEGRATION_SOURCE = "d0905682c36203007923d73bf3d3aec6";
 
 
 var externalInterfaceGr = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_integrations_external_interface');
 externalInterfaceGr.addQuery("source_table_name", current.getTableName());
 externalInterfaceGr.addQuery("source_table_sys_id", current.sys_id);
 externalInterfaceGr.addQuery("process_type", "synchronous");
 externalInterfaceGr.addQuery("status","IN","pending,work_in_progress");
 externalInterfaceGr.query();
 if(externalInterfaceGr.hasNext()){
  gs.info("Record with source_table_name : "+current.getTableName()+" and source_table_sys_id : "+current.sys_id+"already exists in external interface in either pending/work in progress status");
  return;
 }
 externalInterfaceGr.initialize();
 externalInterfaceGr.setValue("source_table_name", current.getTableName());
 externalInterfaceGr.setValue("source_table_sys_id", current.sys_id);
 externalInterfaceGr.setValue("process_type", "synchronous");
 externalInterfaceGr.setValue("status", "pending");
 
 var mappingGr = new GlideRecord("sn_hr_integrations_service_mapping");
 mappingGr.addActiveQuery();        mappingGr.addQuery("hr_integration_outbound_service",ACCURATE_BG_CHECK_PLACE_ORDER_OUTBOUND_SERVICE);
 mappingGr.addQuery("hr_external_source",ACCURATE_BG_CHECK_HR_INTEGRATION_SOURCE);
 mappingGr.query();
 if(mappingGr.hasNext()){
  mappingGr.next();
  externalInterfaceGr.setValue("hr_integration_service_mapping",mappingGr.getValue("sys_id"));
  externalInterfaceGr.insert();
 }else{
  gs.info("No Service Mapping found for outbound service");
  return;
 }
 
})(current, previous);]]></script>
